title: Rajinikanth speaks about the greatness of spirituality in Yogoda Sastanga Society centenary celebration - Tamil Movie News
text: Jyothika's next to release today Superstar Rajinikanth who is busy shooting and dubbing for his mega budget sic-fi entertainer '2.0' has been attending public functions quite often of late. On Saturday he graced the centenary year celebration of Yogoda Sastanga Society founded by Sri Sri Pramahamsa Yogoda and released the spirituality book 'Deiveega Kadhal' (தெய்வீககாதல்). The 66 year old star also addressed the gathering about the immense greatness of spirituality. "Am always proud to be a Spiritual person. I like Spirituality more than Money & other things.. Spirituality gives me more power." he said. Tracing his history of learning spirituality he said "My first Guru is my brother Sathyanarayana. My first spiritual Guru is Sachidanandhar. After his death I have been following various Gurus.I learn devotion from Raghavendra. I learnt to search who I am from Ramana Maharishi. Paramahamsa Yogananda's autobiography created a big impact in me. My search of spirituality still continues." The 'Enthiran' star who is known to be a frequent visitor to Himalayas further said "There's lots & lots of secrets in Mount Everest & am in search of that divine secrets".
